message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's worth a lot to me, but I'm confident it will be even more valuable to you. I'm starting with a price of $1,750,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's potential. Let's discuss this further.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,200,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to compromise a bit further, but I need to be closer to my initial offer. Let's split the difference. I'm offering the product for $1,500,000. This price reflects the product's value and allows us both to gain from this deal. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $1,500,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,300,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I see your point, but $1,300,000 is still too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to be at least $1,400,000 to make this deal work. This price is still fair considering the product's value, and it gives us both a good outcome.  I'm hopeful we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not comfortable with $1,400,000. I'm willing to go up to $1,350,000, but that's as high as I can go. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to go down to $1,450,000. This is a fair compromise, and it brings us closer to a deal. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement on this offer, as we're running out of rounds.  If this doesn't work, I might have to explore other options.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $1,450,000. I'm willing to meet you at $1,375,000, but that's as high as I can go. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
